name: Docker Vite Blank Starter
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y build-essential python3 && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install
postCreateCommand: if [ -z "$(git log -1 2>/dev/null)" ] || [ "$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)" != "dev" ]; then git init && git checkout -b dev && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: initial commit'; fi && if [ -d .husky ]; then git config core.hooksPath .husky && chmod +x .husky/* 2>/dev/null || true; fi
updateContentCommand: if [ ! -d node_modules ] || [ ! -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then pnpm install; else pnpm update; fi
